thread.title: Video Rewind: Feeling Romantic at the Disneyland Resort
thread.title_full: Video Rewind: Feeling Romantic at the Disneyland Resort

author: Erin Glover
title: Video Rewind: Feeling Romantic at the Disneyland Resort
text:
Valentine’s Day is almost here, and it’s inspired us to look back at some of the sweet videos we’ve captured throughout the years featuring our guests in love! Here are some of my favorites …

I love flowers all the time, and especially on Valentine’s Day, so this tour of Disneyland park flowers is a perennial favorite. Get it?

In this video, guests shared the sweet ways they commemorate their special occasions and anniversaries together at the Disneyland Resort .

We also asked our guests to share their favorite romantic memories from the Disneyland Resort in this video. Do you have a favorite romantic Disneyland memory? Share with us in the comments!
